thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 4 de 684
thread.title: NG

author: NG
title: NG
text:
I have used most big car rental names before and can honestly say that since I tried Goldcar in Malta last January, I won't be going anywhere else. No drama or unexpected charges plus a full fuel tank, an affordable super relax cover and a decent clean car. I honestly cannot understand all the bad reviews on Google - seems to me that many do not bother to read the T&C, which are pretty much standard in this industry.
Thank you Goldcar and will be seeing you again.
